Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted NB: State, Kinzie, Dearborn and Illinois; SB: Grand, Clark, Kinzie, and State due to street blockage near State/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/Hubbard due to street blockage near State/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Kinzie, Dearborn and Illinois.

Southbound buses will operate via Grand, Clark, Kinzie, and State.

Allow extra travel time.
